segments.text: I haven't seen Bill lately . How is he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too bad . What does he have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don't know , but he's going to the doctor tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me know if there's anything I can do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I'll tell him .
segments.speaker: S2
